text:
"Our family has been attending Mass there for years. Most of the parishioners are friendly and welcoming. We always feel a sense of peace upon entering the church. The altar is beautifully designed and radiates a special energy.

Over the years, the church has undergone several improvements while still preserving its original charm. The place is clean and well-maintained, thanks to the dedication of volunteers, parishioners, and cleaners. A heartfelt thank you to all who contribute to keeping this sacred space so beautiful!"
Was under renovations but still a serene & spiritual place.

It is my church now as I live nearby only. I love the ambience and also the choir singing hymns every mass. The homily as well is great so far from the two parish priests I came with. Fully air conditioned, and for sure, you can relax and pray here silently with no distraction. Photos are from inside view.
I've been there during the feast day last  tuesday..  Beautiful  church,  adoration chapel  is open from 6am-12mn..  will come back again...
Beautiful cathedral and choir that made Christmas Mass a special occasion
